mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICENUM, EMPLOYEENUM, TITLE, CONTENTS, REGDATE, MODDATE,CATEGORY, HIT, PIN) VALUES (NULL, #{employeeNum}, #{title}, #{contents}, NOW(), NOW(),#{category}, 0, #{pin})
mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICENUM, N.EMPLOYEENUM, N.CATEGORY, N.TITLE, E.NAME, N.MODDATE, N.HIT, N.CONTENTS, NF.ORINAME, NF.FILENUM, NF.FILENAME FROM NOTICE N LEFT JOIN NOTICEFILE NF ON (N.NOTICENUM=NF.NOTICENUM) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (N.EMPLOYEENUM=E.EMPLOYEENUM) WHERE N.NOTICENUM=#{noticeNum}
SELECT N.NOTICENUM, N.CATEGORY, N.TITLE, E.NAME, N.EMPLOYEENUM, N.MODDATE, N.HIT, N.PIN FROM NOTICE N JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (N.EMPLOYEENUM=E.EMPLOYEENUM) WHERE PIN=1

SELECT N.NOTICENUM, N.CATEGORY, N.TITLE, E.NAME, N.EMPLOYEENUM, N.MODDATE, N.HIT, N.PIN FROM NOTICE N JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (N.EMPLOYEENUM=E.EMPLOYEENUM) WHERE
LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') ORDER BY N.NOTICENUM DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{lastRow}

SELECT N.NOTICENUM, N.CATEGORY, N.TITLE, E.NAME, N.EMPLOYEENUM, N.MODDATE, N.HIT FROM NOTICE N JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (N.EMPLOYEENUM=E.EMPLOYEENUM) WHERE CATEGORY = #{notice.category} AND
LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pager.search},'%') ORDER BY N.NOTICENUM DESC LIMIT #{pager.startRow}, #{pager.lastRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET CATEGORY=#{category}, TITLE=#{title}, CONTENTS=#{contents}, MODDATE=NOW() WHERE NOTICENUM=#{noticeNum}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(N.NOTICENUM) FROM NOTICE N JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (N.EMPLOYEENUM=E.EMPLOYEENUM) WHERE
LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
SELECT COUNT(NOTICENUM) FROM NOTICE WHERE CATEGORY = #{category}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET HIT=HIT+1 WHERE NOTICENUM=#{noticeNum}
